entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Ice fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
